attributes.action: keep call centres in the country they are serving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All call centres should be in the the country they are serving,and not in other countries that have no conection with the business contacted.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
